roleset.name: persuade completely
roleset.note: BRAINWASH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brainwash' based on survey of sentences in ectb. No verbnet entry. Based frames on urge-58. (from brainwash.01-v predicate notes)
BRAINWASHED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from brainwashed.01-j)

example.text: In the past two years , [*] perhaps brainwashed [*]by money management dogma that [*T*] says " the early bird gets the worm , " investors have swarmed like bees for the latest fads , [*] sometimes jumping in even before the true value is known [*] .
example.arg: by money management dogma that [*T*] says " the early bird gets the worm

example.name: Within CXN
example.text: Unfortunately most TSR'rs are too brainwashed to see that .

example.name: Ugh, bad brainwashing!
example.text: Karen Robidoux says she was ?brainwashed? by her husband to cooperate in the starvation death of her one-year-old son Samuel.
example.arg: to cooperate in the starvation death of her one-year-old son Samuel.
